data.text: @ian_marsh84 @ProfessorFerg8 you found it yet mike ? the silence from the public who were asking for masks/jabs and all sorts is mystifying, and they believe it just died over night and we went to war .. but donâ€™t suspect the media are upto no good! please find it mike #drmike

@jonkennaugh @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 I don't even know why we were arguing tbh. My first comment was simply that the vaccine doesn't work against omicron but that was enough for you to seem deem me anti vax. Honestly I want you to have as many vaccines as you possibly can. I'll even let you have all my boosters 😘
@Feeblemr2 @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 🤣🤣🤣 I'm not a reporter, you blithering idiot. 🤪🤪🤪

@jonkennaugh @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 Have you really never managed to make it above reporter in your entire career? I'm surprised you hate corbyn tbh. Usually those with no money and no prospects love him. 

You been doing that job for 15 years now mate.  Probably time to try and make something of your life.
@Feeblemr2 @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 And you crack on with your sad, bitter existence and finding comfort through the pain in those dim-bulb conspiracy theories. 👍

@jonkennaugh @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 This kind of denigration is what I've come to expect from people like you. Some know it all who has never amounted to anything in life (typical left winger). Keep writing rubbish for pennies mate.  You'll make it one day (unlikely).

@Feeblemr2 @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 You stick with your YouTube loons that spoon-feed idiot conspiracy cobblers to people who aren't very intelligent, & convince them that "the elites" are endlessly hatching evil plans. Believing QAnon or whatever doesn't make you a "free thinker", it makes you a gullible moron.
@jonkennaugh @FNBodySlams @ProfessorFerg8 Stick at the freelance mate.  You'll never progress to investigative with your closed mind.  Boot licking and reporting the village fair more your area.
